message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL 

This paper is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it deals with text detection in images. Additionally, the use of deep learning techniques such as local segmentation networks and curve connection suggests that it may also belong to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The paper may also be relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR) as text detection is often a crucial step in document analysis and retrieval. Finally, the paper may also be relevant to computational linguistics (cs.CL) as it deals with text segmentation and connection.
